name.ja: <ruby>幻<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>刃<rt>ば</rt></ruby><ruby>歩<rt>ほ</rt></ruby><ruby>哨<rt>しょう</rt></ruby>ドラグライン

requirement.en: Shuffle 3 Wyrm Type monsters from your Graveyard into the Deck.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 8 Wyrm Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. Then, if you Special Summoned "Constructor Wyrm Buildragon" by this effect, you can add 1 Wyrm Type monster with 0 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.
